title: Fact-Check: That Photo of Sambit Patra With Vikas Dubey is Morphed
subtitle: Sambit Patra With Vikas Dubey Fact Check: A viral image of BJP spokesperson Sambit Patra dancing at a function with history-sheeter Vikas Dubey who was killed in a Police encounter on 10 July, is doing rounds on social media.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The claim along with the image reads: “सम्बित पात्रा के साथ डांस करते विकास दुबे बड़ी मुश्किल से मिला है यह फोटो” [Translation: Accessed this photograph of Sambit Patra dancing with Vikas Dubey after great difficulty.]

The image is being massively circulated on Facebook and Twitter with the same misleading claim.
